newsitem.title: USA: Whitney to acquire First National Bankshares.
newsitem.headline: Whitney to acquire First National Bankshares.

text.p: Whitney Holding Corp. said Friday that it would acquire First National Bankshares Inc. in a $41 million stock deal.
Under the deal, shareholders of First National Bankshares will receive about $20.32 per share in stock of New Orleans-based Whitney, the parent of Whitney National Bank and Whitney Bank of Alabama.
First National Bankshares is the parent company of First National Bank of Houma, La., and has four banking facilities in Houma and one banking facility in Chauvin, La.
Whitney National Bank has 61 branches throughout southern Louisiana. Whitney Bank of Alabama has 10 branches in that state's Mobile, Montgomery and Baldwin Counties.
